Name: MC Lars 2: Brotherhood
About the game: The sequel to MC Lars: The Video Game, MC Lars: Brotherhood features even more rhythm-based platforming than the original and incorporates a colorful cast of nerdcoreâ€™s finest rappers. Play as MC Lars, MC Frontalot, Mega Ran, YTCracker, and Schaffer the Darklord through more than a dozen levels of action-packed tracks. As you close on a battle with the evil Dr. Autotune, play two characters at once as they perform collab tracks and join forces to save music and the world from the evils of autotune. MC Lars 2: Brotherhood features: 16 unique levels that bring the music of MC Lars, MC Frontalot, Mega Ran, YTCracker, and Schaffer the Darkload to life with 16-bit visuals and dynamic levels. Beat-driven platforming that melds the action of each track to the action in the game. An epic story of friendship, nerdcore, and high-stakes.
